title: Key executives across sales, services and logistics exit from Honda Motorcycles and Scooters India
description: Apart from Guleria, Pradeep Pandey senior vice-president (customer service), HMSI has put in his papers. In February this year Shekhar MC, formerly general manager (finished vehicles logistics), too exited the company and joined Ola Electric Mobility.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
